name: openrap-sunbirded-plugin
description: This plugin provides api's for offline consumption

scripts.build: tslint **/*.ts  && node_modules/.bin/rimraf ./dist  && tsc --noImplicitUseStrict && node_modules/.bin/cpy package.json ./dist &&  node_modules/.bin/cpy  db/* dist/db/pouchdb
scripts.pre-test: rimraf test && tsc --noImplicitUseStrict --outDir test/openrap-sunbirded-plugin && node_modules/.bin/cpy package.json test/openrap-sunbirded-plugin &&  node_modules/.bin/cpy  db/* test/openrap-sunbirded-plugin/db/pouchdb
scripts.test: tslint **/*.ts && npm run post-test && npm run pre-test &&  nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --timeout 10000 --exit -r ts-node/register **/**/*.spec.ts **/*.spec.ts *.spec.ts --exclude **/node_modules/** && npm run post-test
scripts.post-test: rimraf test test_data/openrap-sunbirded-plugin/content test_data/openrap-sunbirded-plugin/ecars test_data/openrap-sunbirded-plugin/telemetry_archived test_data/database/* test_data/log test_data/export_contents/*
